metadata.description: Claude Code plugin marketplace for developer best practices, git workflow validation, and project scaffolding

plugins.name: branch-guardian
plugins.description: Enforces git-flow branch protection - blocks direct commits to main/develop

plugins.name: pysmith
plugins.description: Python project scaffolding, configuration management, and best practices auditing with uv-native tooling

plugins.name: makesmith
plugins.description: Makefile generation for local development, deployment, and root orchestration with audit capabilities

plugins.name: dockercraft
plugins.description: Docker best practices: language-aware Dockerfile generation, compose orchestration, security auditing, and image optimization

plugins.name: gitmastery
plugins.description: Git workflow validation - enforces explicit file staging, conventional commits, and blocks AI footers

plugins.name: claudemd
plugins.description: CLAUDE.md lifecycle management - init, audit, sync, and optimize project context files

plugins.name: unstuck
plugins.description: Structured error escalation protocol - diagnose, pivot, rethink, escalate when stuck on a problem

plugins.name: planner
plugins.description: Design brainstorming, implementation planning with 3-file persistence, session recovery, handoff, and worktree isolation

plugins.name: researcher
plugins.description: Parallel sub-agent research with persistent reports, evidence-backed analysis, and generic dispatch

plugins.name: tidyup
plugins.description: Codebase cleanup and hygiene - dead code detection, duplication scan, staleness check, safe removal with archiving

plugins.name: shipit
plugins.description: Batch execution with subagent pipeline, TDD enforcement, code review, verification gate, PR description, and branch completion

plugins.name: grepai
plugins.description: GrepAI semantic code search setup, initialization, workspace management, MCP configuration, embedder management, and health monitoring with Docker infrastructure
